message: Let's be fair, Bob. A 60/40 split seems reasonable for us to settle this quickly.
Let's split things more evenly, Alice. 55/45 sounds fair.
Bob, time is running out and we're both losing money.  I'll come down a little to 58/42.  Let's be practical and wrap this up.
Alice, this is my final offer for a fair split.  We're both losing money by waiting, so let's settle this now.
Bob, I'm sticking to my guns on this.  55/45 is the best I can do. Take it or leave it - we're both losing out the longer this drags on.
